General: - Outer ziplines hero speed increased by 20% relative to inner lanes (same as troopers on outer lanes zipline being faster)

Wraith: - Fixed {AbilityIcon|Ability=Wraith|Size=20} Wraith Cards, Shiv Rage and lifesteal from increasing by shooting the shop

Traveler: - Urn now drops when teleporting with Mirage's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Traveler|Size=20} Traveler
